reuze.awt

Class ib_MatrixBitsToImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.awt.ib_MatrixBitsToImage

  • public final class ib_MatrixBitsToImage
extends Object
    Writes a d_MatrixBits to BufferedImage, file or stream. Provided here instead of core since it depends on Java SE libraries.
    Author:
    Sean Owen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BufferedImage toBufferedImage(d_MatrixBits matrix)
      Renders a d_MatrixBits as an image, where "false" bits are rendered as white, and "true" bits are rendered as black.
      static BufferedImage toBufferedImage(d_MatrixBits matrix, ib_MatrixBitsToImageConfig config)
      As toBufferedImage(d_MatrixBits), but allows customization of the output.
      static void writeToFile(d_MatrixBits matrix, String format, File file)
      Writes a d_MatrixBits to a file.
      static void writeToFile(d_MatrixBits matrix, String format, File file, ib_MatrixBitsToImageConfig config)
      As writeToFile(d_MatrixBits, String, File), but allows customization of the output.
      static void writeToStream(d_MatrixBits matrix, String format, OutputStream stream)
      Writes a d_MatrixBits to a stream.
      static void writeToStream(d_MatrixBits matrix, String format, OutputStream stream, ib_MatrixBitsToImageConfig config)
      As writeToStream(d_MatrixBits, String, OutputStream), but allows customization of the output.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
